Text:
Only wish you packed every game in it's own zip. That way I just check the files to see all 20 games :P 

Other than that, quite nice. Black Cauldron is an old adventure game more aimed at kids, but since most people these days doesn't seem to play much adv games where u have to use ur brain, this prob gonna be a hard game for em anyway :P hahj
Great package of laptop games! Thanks!

These are not Laptop Games, these are ZX Spectrum remakes as I see.
Well not all and not all ZX Spectrum.
But it is fun.

looks like fun.
